ModMetaData.name: Corruption
ModMetaData.author: Ohu
ModMetaData.description:
Public A18. A Warhammer 40k conversion mod. Unstable version. For now this is a proof of concept mod with a lot of placeholders and half-implemented features.
Team: Cpt.Ohu - Assembly, XML, Textures TrashMan - Textures, XML BanditPanda/Baron - Textures KriegsStrudel - Textures StoneWolf - Assembly, XML Imperitor - Assembly, XML InfinityKage - Concept/Balancing
